title: duck_house_temperature_humidity_check
summary: Morning temperature and humidity measurement inside the duck house.
description: Image documents a temperature and humidity reading taken inside the duck house using a digital thermo-hygrometer. The measurement was conducted in the morning and later cross-referenced with visible dew conditions on surrounding plants.
context_notes: Used to correlate with dew presence on plants
Supports micro-climate consistency across farm zones

external_reference.note: Image shows a thermo-hygrometer placed inside the duck house.
